row.Name: Correlativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right((coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr < 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))),9)

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert(((Select sum(linetotalamt) From c_invoiceline il Where il.C_Invoice_ID= $P{TABLE}.C_Invoice_ID and C_Tax_ID=1000096)*100.00/18.00 + $P{TABLE}.grandtotal), $P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID)

row.Name: Correativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right ((COALESCE( min(case when left($P{TABLE}.fact_id,2)='14' then $P{TABLE}.fact_id end ), min(case when left($P{TABLE}.fact_id,2)!='14' then $P{TABLE}.fact_id end ))),9)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr < 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: Retencion
row.ColumnSQL: case when (SELECT max(c_invoice_id) from c_retention r where r.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id) = $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id then '1' else '' end

row.Name: Tasa de Cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id != 308 then round(currencyrate( $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '0.000' end

row.Name: FechRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT to_char(dateinvoiced,'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Tasa de cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id !=308 then round(currencyrate($P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, (Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice ir where ir.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id), $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '1.000' end

row.Name: Correativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right((coalesce(min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))),9)

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert($P{TABLE}.grandtotal,$P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308,(Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id),$P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID) ::numeric

row.Name: Tasa de cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id !=308 then round(currencyrate( $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '1.000' end

row.Name: Tip.Comprobante
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.isdistribution = 'Y' then '00' when $P{TABLE}.ad_table_id = 735 then '00' when $P{TABLE}.ad_table_id != 735 and coalesce($P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id,0) != 0 then (select codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id) else '00' end)

row.Name: Fechdetraccion
row.ColumnSQL: case when $P{TABLE}.isdetraction='Y' then to_char(datedetraction,'DD/MM/YYYY') else '01/01/0001' end

row.Name: FechaRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT to_char(dateinvoiced,'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: (CASE WHEN (rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC))::integer >= 10 THEN (fact_id)::text||'-'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) ELSE (fact_id)::text||'-0'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) END)

row.Name: Tasa de cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id != 308 then round(currencyrate($P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, (Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice ir where ir.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id), $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '0.000' end

row.Name: BaseGravada
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.docstatus = 'CO' then ( case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text)!=0 then round(gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text),2) else '0.00' end ) else '0.00' end )

row.Name: TipoIDProv
row.ColumnSQL: CASE WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'R' then '6' when (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'D' then '1' else 0 end

row.Name: SerieRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(serial,4,'0') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Correlativo + tipo
row.ColumnSQL: (case when isopendocument = 'Y' then 'A' ELSE (case when isclosedocument = 'Y' then 'C' else 'M' end)end)||right((CASE WHEN (rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC))::integer >= 10 THEN (fact_id)::text||'-'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) ELSE (fact_id)::text||'-0'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) END),9)

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert($P{TABLE}.grandtotal,$P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308,(Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id),$P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID) * (-1)::numeric

row.Name: Tasa de cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id !=308 then round(currencyrate($P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, (Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice ir where ir.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id), $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '1.000' end

row.Name: FechRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT to_char(dateinvoiced,'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: NoGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) > 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end

row.Name: BalanceDebe
row.ColumnSQL: round((case when (SUM($P{TABLE}.activo_b) - SUM($P{TABLE}.pasivo_b))>0 then (SUM($P{TABLE}.activo_b) - SUM($P{TABLE}.pasivo_b)) else 0 end),2)

row.Name: tipo de gasto
row.ColumnSQL: CASE WHEN (SELECT max(po_gs) from m_product p join c_invoiceline il on c_invoice.c_invoice_id = il.c_invoice_id where p.m_product_id = il.m_product_id) ISNULL THEN (SELECT max(po_gs) from c_charge c join c_invoiceline il on c_invoice.c_invoice_id = il.c_invoice_id where c.c_charge_id = il.c_charge_id) ELSE (SELECT max(po_gs) from m_product p join c_invoiceline il on c_invoice.c_invoice_id = il.c_invoice_id where p.m_product_id = il.m_product_id) end

row.Name: NoGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) > 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end

row.Name: Inafecta
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) > 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end

row.Name: BaseGravada
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert(((Select sum(linetotalamt) From c_invoiceline il Where il.C_Invoice_ID= $P{TABLE}.C_Invoice_ID and C_Tax_ID=1000096)*100.00/18.00), $P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID)

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: Correlativo + tipo
row.ColumnSQL: (case when isopendocument = 'Y' then 'A' ELSE (case when isclosedocument = 'Y' then 'C' else 'M' end)end)||right((CASE WHEN (rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC))::integer >= 10 THEN (fact_id)::text||'-'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) ELSE (fact_id)::text||'-0'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) END),9)

row.Name: NoGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) != 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end

row.Name: NoGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) != 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end

row.Name: NumRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad((documentno::numeric)::character varying,20,' ') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert($P{TABLE}.grandtotal,$P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308,(Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id),$P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID) * (-1)::numeric

row.Name: NumRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(documentno,20,'') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Tip.Doc
row.ColumnSQL: CASE WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'R' then '6' when (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'D' then '1' else 0 end

row.Name: IGV
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert((Select sum(linetotalamt) From c_invoiceline il Where il.C_Invoice_ID= $P{TABLE}.C_Invoice_ID and C_Tax_ID=1000096), $P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID)

row.Name: ResHaber
row.ColumnSQL: round((case when (SUM($P{TABLE}.ingreso_rn) - SUM($P{TABLE}.gasto_rn))>0 then (SUM($P{TABLE}.ingreso_rn) - SUM($P{TABLE}.gasto_rn)) else 0 end),2)

row.Name: Numero
row.ColumnSQL: (case when coalesce($P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id,00) = 00 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_acct_id::character varying) when (select codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id)= '00' then lpad($P{TABLE}.invoicedocumentno,20,' ') else lpad(( substring($P{TABLE}.invoicedocumentno,'(\d+)' )::numeric)::character varying,20,' ') end)

row.Name: TipDoc
row.ColumnSQL: CASE WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'R' then '6' when (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'D' then '1' else 0 end

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr >0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: SaldoHaber
row.ColumnSQL: round((case when (SUM($P{TABLE}.haber_f) - SUM($P{TABLE}.debe_f))>0 then (SUM($P{TABLE}.haber_f) - SUM($P{TABLE}.debe_f)) else 0 end),2)

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.docstatus = 'CO' then (CurrencyConvert($P{TABLE}.grandtotal,$P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308,(Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id),$P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID) * (-1)::numeric) else '0.00' end )

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert($P{TABLE}.grandtotal,$P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308,(Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id),$P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID) * (-1)::numeric

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: FechRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT to_char(dateinvoiced,'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: NumRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad((documentno::numeric)::character varying,20,' ') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: campo8
row.ColumnSQL: Case when coalesce($P{TABLE}.documentno,'')!= null then lpad(($P{TABLE}.documentto::numeric)::character varying,20,' ') else '' end

row.Name: Tasa de Cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id != 308 then round(currencyrate($P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, (Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice ir where ir.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id), $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '1.000' end

row.Name: estado
row.ColumnSQL: case when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then (case when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '1' when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) < EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '6' else 'otro' end) when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) - EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = 1 then (case when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) >= EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '6' else '7' end) when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) - EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) >1 then '7' else 'otro' end

row.Name: Estado
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.docstatus='VO' then '2' when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '1' when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '1' when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) < EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '8' when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) < EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '8' else 'otro' end)

row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(documentno,20,'') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: FechaRef.
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT to_char(dateinvoiced,'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Estado
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.docstatus='VO' then '2' when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '1' when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '1' when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) < EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '8' when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) < EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '8' else 'otro' end)

row.Name: SerieRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(serial,4,'0') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: NumRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(documentno,20,'') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctcr < 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr < 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: Correlativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right((coalesce(min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))),9)

row.Name: SerieRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(serial,4,'0') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: BalanceHaber
row.ColumnSQL: round((case when (SUM($P{TABLE}.pasivo_b) - SUM($P{TABLE}.activo_b))>0 then (SUM($P{TABLE}.pasivo_b) - SUM($P{TABLE}.activo_b)) else 0 end),2)

row.Name: TipoDoc
row.ColumnSQL: (CASE WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id = c_bpartner_id) = 'R'::bpchar THEN 6 WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id = c_bpartner_id) = 'D'::bpchar THEN 1 ELSE 0 END)

row.Name: Estado
row.ColumnSQL: case when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then (case when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '1' when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) < EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '6' else 'otro' end) when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) - EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) = 1 then (case when EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) >= EXTRACT(month from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) then '6' else '7' end) when EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateacct) - EXTRACT(year from $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced) >1 then '7' else 'otro' end

row.Name: FechRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT to_char(dateinvoiced,'DD/MM/YYYY') FROM c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Tip.Comprobante
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.isdistribution = 'Y' then '00' when $P{TABLE}.ad_table_id = 735 then '00' when $P{TABLE}.ad_table_id != 735 and coalesce($P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id,0) != 0 then (select codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id) else '00' end)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctdr < 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: SerieRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(serial,4,'0') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Fechdetraccion
row.ColumnSQL: case when $P{TABLE}.isdetraction='Y' then to_char(datedetraction,'DD/MM/YYYY') else '01/01/0001' end

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: IGV
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert((Select sum(linetotalamt) From c_invoiceline il Where il.C_Invoice_ID= $P{TABLE}.C_Invoice_ID and C_Tax_ID=1000096), $P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID)

row.Name: Correlativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right((coalesce(min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctcr < 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))),9)

row.Name: BaseGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text)!=0 then round(gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text),2) else '0.00' end

row.Name: Tipo de accion
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT value FROM ad_ref_list refl where refl.ad_reference_id = 1000099 and $P{TABLE}.taxid = refl.value)

row.Name: SerieRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(serial,4,'0') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when left($P{TABLE}.fact_id,2)='08' then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when left($P{TABLE}.fact_id,2)!='08' then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: Retencion
row.ColumnSQL: case when (SELECT max(c_invoice_id) from c_retention r where r.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id) = $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id then '1' else ' ' end

row.Name: BaseGravada
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert(((Select sum(linetotalamt) From c_invoiceline il Where il.C_Invoice_ID= $P{TABLE}.C_Invoice_ID and C_Tax_ID=1000096)*100.00/18.00), $P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID)

row.Name: TipDoc
row.ColumnSQL: CASE WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'R' then '6' when (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'D' then '1' else 0 end

row.Name: BaseGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text)!=0 then round(gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text),2) else '0.00' end

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: Correlativo + tipo
row.ColumnSQL: (case when isopendocument = 'Y' then 'A' ELSE (case when isclosedocument = 'Y' then 'C' else 'M' end)end)||right((CASE WHEN (rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC))::integer >= 10 THEN (fact_id)::text||'-'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) ELSE (fact_id)::text||'-0'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) END),9)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: Correlativo + tipo
row.ColumnSQL: (case when isopendocument = 'Y' then 'A' ELSE (case when isclosedocument = 'Y' then 'C' else 'M' end)end)||right((CASE WHEN (rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC))::integer >= 10 THEN (fact_id)::text||'-'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) ELSE (fact_id)::text||'-0'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) END),9)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: Base
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) != 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end

row.Name: Correlativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right((coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))),9)

row.Name: SerieRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT lpad(serial,4,'0') from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id)

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: (CASE WHEN (rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC))::integer >= 10 THEN (fact_id)::text||'-'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) ELSE (fact_id)::text||'-0'||(rank() OVER (PARTITION BY fact_id ORDER BY fact_acct_id DESC)) END)

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: Tip.Doc
row.ColumnSQL: CASE WHEN (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'R' then '6' when (select c_bp_doctypei from c_bpartner where c_bpartner_id = $P{TABLE}.c_bpartner_id) = 'D' then '1' else 0 end

row.Name: BaseGravada
row.ColumnSQL: case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text)!=0 then round(gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'IGV'::text, 'BASE'::text),2) else '0.00' end

row.Name: Correlativo
row.ColumnSQL: COALESCE( min(case when left($P{TABLE}.fact_id,2)='14' then $P{TABLE}.fact_id end ), min(case when left($P{TABLE}.fact_id,2)!='14' then $P{TABLE}.fact_id end ))

row.Name: Correativo+tipo
row.ColumnSQL: 'M'||right((coalesce(min(case when amtacctdr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end),min(case when amtacctcr > 0 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_id) end))),9)

row.Name: Numero
row.ColumnSQL: (case when coalesce($P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id,00) = 00 then ($P{TABLE}.fact_acct_id::character varying) when (select codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id = $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id)= '00' then lpad($P{TABLE}.invoicedocumentno,20,' ') else lpad(( substring($P{TABLE}.invoicedocumentno,'(\d+)' )::numeric)::character varying,20,' ') end)

row.Name: Inafecta
row.ColumnSQL: (case when $P{TABLE}.docstatus = 'CO' then (case when gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) > 0 then gettaxvalue( $P{TABLE}.c_doctype_id, $P{TABLE}.c_invoice_id, 'NGR'::text, 'BASE'::text) else '0.00' end) else '0.00' end )

row.Name: TipRef
row.ColumnSQL: (SELECT codsunat from c_doctype where c_doctype_id in (SELECT c_doctype_id from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id))

row.Name: Total
row.ColumnSQL: CurrencyConvert($P{TABLE}.grandtotal,$P{TABLE}.C_Currency_ID, 308,(Select dateinvoiced from c_invoice iref where iref.c_invoice_id = $P{TABLE}.ref_invoice_id),$P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id,$P{TABLE}.AD_Client_ID, $P{TABLE}.AD_Org_ID) * (-1)::numeric

row.Name: Tasa de Cambio
row.ColumnSQL: Case when $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id != 308 then round(currencyrate( $P{TABLE}.c_currency_id, 308, $P{TABLE}.dateinvoiced, $P{TABLE}.c_conversiontype_id, $P{TABLE}.ad_client_id, 0),3) else '1.000' end

row.Name: 030600 - I&B Cta 19
row.GroupByClause: taxid, namebp, taxtype, codsunat, serial, invoicedocumentno

row.Name: 050300 - LIBRO DIARIO DETALLE DEL PLAN DE CUENTAS
